question: After birth of my baby - I was in nifaas for 40 days. The first 3 weeks I was bleeding then slowly brown blood was coming out.
answer:
QUESTION

Dear Mufti Saab

After birth of my baby - I was in nifaas for 40 days. The first 3 weeks I was bleeding then slowly brown blood was coming out.

At 40 days - there was faint light blood.  on Day 41 - Bleeding started with red blood.  This lasted 7 days.

Please can you advise if the days after 40 days is instihadha or menstruation..??

Jazah Kallah

ANSWER


Share:

Assalamu Alaikum Warahmatullah

 

Brother/Sister in Islam

 

The bleeding after the 40 days of Nifaas is Istihaada.

 

 

And Allah Knows Best

 

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
